meanings.definition: A small moth of the family Tortricidae.
meanings.sent1: The tortrix fluttered around the garden in the evening.
meanings.sent2: I saw a tortrix resting on a leaf in the park.
meanings.sent3: The tortrix thought it was a leaf and tried to blend in.
meanings.sent4: The tortrix danced gracefully in the moonlight, resembling a tiny fairy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tortrix with delicate wings was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: A caterpillar of a tortrix moth.
meanings.sent1: The tortrix crawled slowly along the branch, munching on leaves.
meanings.sent2: I found a tortrix caterpillar hiding under a rock.
meanings.sent3: The tortrix caterpillar pretended to be a twig to avoid predators.
meanings.sent4: The tortrix caterpillar's green body blended perfectly with the leaves.
meanings.sent5: Watching the tortrix caterpillar transform into a moth was fascinating.

meanings.sent1: The tortrix fluttered gracefully in the warm summer breeze.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a tortrix moth flying near the porch light.
meanings.sent3: The tortrix moth played hide-and-seek with the other insects.
meanings.sent4: The tortrix moth's wings shimmered like precious jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The elusive tortrix moth was a rare find in the forest.
